DealInsertUpdateTestCase.InsertXml: <DealInsert xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="DealInsert.xsd"> <MetaData> <Timezone>CET 06-06</Timezone> </MetaData> <Transaction> <TransactionType>Automatic</TransactionType> <DealType>Gas-Storage</DealType> <Portfolios> <Portfolio>API Test Customer</Portfolio> <CounterpartyPortfolio>API Test Counterparty</CounterpartyPortfolio> <BuySell>Buy</BuySell> </Portfolios> <GasStorage> <InstrumentData> <PriceBasis>TTF</PriceBasis> <FromDate>2016-03-01</FromDate> <ToDate>2016-03-31</ToDate> <Physical> <DeliveryArea AreaName="TTF"/> <DeliveryLocation>TTF_StorageLocation</DeliveryLocation> </Physical> <TransactionName>gas-storage-deal-04</TransactionName> </InstrumentData> <SettlementData> <FlexibleStructuredDealInformation> <TimeSeries> <TimeSeriesType>VolumeMeasurement</TimeSeriesType> <Resolution>Daily</Resolution> <TimeSeriesDetail FromDateTime="2016-02-29T00:00:00" ToDateTime="2016-03-01T00:00:00" Value="1000" /> </TimeSeries> </FlexibleStructuredDealInformation> <QuantityUnit>MWh/d</QuantityUnit> <Currency>EUR</Currency> <PriceVolumeUnit>PerMWh</PriceVolumeUnit> <CurrencySource>Viz</CurrencySource> </SettlementData> </GasStorage> <DealDetails> <Status>Active</Status> <Trader>DealImport</Trader> <TradeDate>2014-01-01T14:22:23</TradeDate> </DealDetails> <ReferenceData> <Comment>gas-storage-deal-04</Comment> <DealGroup>gas-storage-deal-04</DealGroup> <ExternalId>gas-storage-deal-04</ExternalId> <ExternalSource>XMLFileImport</ExternalSource> <TicketNumber>TicketNumber</TicketNumber> </ReferenceData> </Transaction> </DealInsert>

ExpectedResult.ErrorMessage: Inserting time series values with data not aligned to time sequence is not supported. Data at time interval UTC 04/27/2016 04:00:00 is not aligned with resolution or date range. Time series type name is Volume Measurement
